subject: p12185775
History: Year old woman with DKA, Intubated for pulmonary edema, improvement.
Impression: ET tube tip is 48 cm above the Carina. NG tube tip is in the stomach. Left central venous line tip is at the level of mid SVC. Heart size and mediastinum are enlarged. Pulmonary edema has substantially improved since the prior study.
